getInfo.FFProbeStream.description: Based on the XML definition of the ffprobe stream type {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/master/doc/ffprobe.xsd#L206}

side_data_type.description: Based on the C code related to the default side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2298}
Based on the C code related to Display Matrix side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2300-L2304}

displaymatrix.description: Mismatches the type linked earlier because ffprobe JSON output reads the printed integers for the display matrix as a string

side_data_type.description: Based on the C code related to Stereo 3D side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2306-L2308}

type.description: Based on the C code of the libauvutil stereo3d file {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/libavutil/stereo3d.c#L47-L56}

side_data_type.description: Based on the C code related to Spherical Mapping side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2310-L2326}

projection.description: Based on the C code of the libauvutil spherical file {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/libavutil/spherical.c#L55-L59}

side_data_type.description: Based on the C code related to Spherical Mapping side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2310-L2326}

projection.description: Based on the C code of the libauvutil spherical file {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/libavutil/spherical.c#L55-L59}

projection.description: Based on the C code of the libauvutil spherical file {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/libavutil/spherical.c#L55-L59}

Based on the C code related to Mastering display metadata side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2333-L2350}

red_x.description: Based on the C code related to Primaries Mastering display metadata side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2336-L2344}

side_data_type.description: Based on the C code related to Mastering display metadata side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2333-L2350}

side_data_type.description: Based on the C code related to Mastering display metadata side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2333-L2350}
Based on the C code related to Mastering display metadata side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2333-L2350}

min_luminance.description: Based on the C code related to Luminance Mastering display metadata side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2348-L2349}

side_data_type.description: Based on the C code related to Content light level metadata side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2352-L2354}
Based on the C code related to DOVI configuration record side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2356-L2364}
Based on the C code related to Audio Service Type side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2366-L2367}

Based on the C code related to CPB properties side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2371-L2376}
Based on the C code related to Webvtt side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2379-L2381}
Based on the C code related to Active format description side data section {@see https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/b37795688a9bfa6d5a2e9b2535c4b10ebc14ac5d/fftools/ffprobe.c#L2383}
